The competition started on March 24, 1907 and concluded on March 30, 1907 with the Final Playoff, in which [[Real Madrid|Madrid FC]] lifted the trophy for the third time in a row. ==Participants== The tournament reached a new record of participants. Moreover, the Catalan regional champion, X Sporting Club, was invited but again refused to participate for internal and financial reasons. At the last minute, FC Barcelona and San Sebastian RC did not attend the event, while the organization dismissed Moderno Guadalajara. The four teams of Madrid played preliminary rounds to choose one single representative of Madrid region. [[Real Madrid|Madrid FC]] won the preliminary rounds and qualified.
